com.likbilen.protorpc.stream.session
Interface SessionManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
SessionRpcController
All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketChannel, TwoWayStream
public interface SessionManager

Session manager, implemented by TwoWayStream to make a server remember session information. The session id is the same when the service is called from the same connection

Method Summary

          Recieve session id set by setSessionId
